item.title: Report E-2025040364
item.description:
Report E-2025040364

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-09T12:25:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-08
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 19:36 PM ET, XLU contacted the call center to report a spill that occurred inside of a trailer in Louisville, KY. The spill consists of approximately 2 ounces of Bakelite PF 7532, which released from (1) 55-gallon metal drum due to the shipper packing the drum too closely to the trailer wall, causing it to be punctured at the bottom. The caller could not be provided cleanup instructions as no SDS could be located online. The call center contacted CareChem24 for an SDS. Once received ERTS will call terminal back on how to clean the spill.

item.title: Report X-2025040731
item.description:
Report X-2025040731

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-09T12:25:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-08
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY WE RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THIRTY-NINE INNER BOXES OF VARIOUS AMMUNITION. ONE INNER BOX IS MARKED AND LABELED UN0012 CARTRIDGES, SMALL ARMS WITH A 1.4S DIAMOND LABEL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTERMOST BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM NEVADA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER A293V6, SHIPPING WAREHOUSE, 9500 CROSSROADS PKWY, FREDERICKSBURG VA 22408-1741.
